channel.title: ruby on Shaaf, Syed's blog
channel.description: Recent content in ruby on Shaaf, Syed's blog

item.title: Get on Jekyll with Jekyll bootstrap
item.description: There has been an era, where we have thought about and implemented blog engines such as wordpress and the like, but then one asks why did we do that in the first place. Good things that come to mind, rich text editing, comments, dynamic content. The last one is a bit of an over kill though , at least in my case. I just host a personal blog, have enough technical knowledge to use tools as git, ruby etc.
